attributes.action: A1(M) to Motorway Standard the whole length
attributes.additional_details:
Upgrade the A1(M) Newcastle to Edinburgh

Responsible department: Department for Transport

Please support this petition to influence the government to invest, expand and upgrade the A1(M) to a full 3 lane motorway from Newcastle to Edinburgh. (Not just dualling it,as that is false economy)

This will bring jobs, trade, and economic development to the Northeast, and Scotland by improving a key trading link nationally.
